dialogueEvents.dialogueText: There was a time long ago, when dragons soared high above humans in the skies of Abaddon.
The dragons grew to loathe the humans, seeing them spread amongst the land as they encroached upon their territory, stole their treasures and trampled over their precious eggs.
In anger, they began to attack human villages, setting them ablaze in unstoppable infernos and slaughtering the helpless villagers.
Humanity begged and prayed, but their pleas were answered only with ashes and despair.
Left with no choice, some fought back.
As fate cast a dark shadow over their future, terror gave way to courage.
Brave warriors arose from all over the land, repelling the dragons and chasing them back to their roosts.
From there emerged the first Dragon Slayers.
The Dragon Slayers took back the tails of the dragons they had defeated to bring hope to their people, a sign of a new age to come for humanity. Their future glimmered, if only briefly...
